div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?
With one million euros we can do a lot of things... What I would personnaly do is invest this money in several ways.
I would maybe invest in something wich can be usefull for my future, something such as a place (a flat, a house, ...) that I could rent.

I would surely invest in personnal projects. I always wanted to create an entreprise who could gives advices and solutions to help other entreprises being more ecological in their actions. This money could definitely help to raise this kind of idea.
